mapper.insert: insert into iims_integral_menu(id, title, parent_id, order_num, path, name, component, icon, menu_type, perms, redirect, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, status, visible, is_frame) VALUES (#{id}, #{title}, #{parentId}, #{orderNum}, #{path}, #{name}, #{component}, #{icon}, #{menuType}, #{perms}, #{redirect}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{status}, #{visible}, #{isFrame})
mapper.select: SELECT m.* FROM iims_integral_admin a JOIN iims_integral_role r ON JSON_CONTAINS(a.role, CAST(r.id AS CHAR)) JOIN iims_integral_menu m ON JSON_CONTAINS(r.menus, CAST(m.id AS CHAR)) WHERE a.id = #{userId} AND a.is_disable = 1 order by m.parent_id, m.order_num;
select * from iims_integral_menu order by order_num;
